puavo.puavomenu.tags.description: Control which programs, menus and categories should be visible or hidden in Puavomenu.

puavo.puavomenu.sidebar_hide_elements.description: Allows you to forcibly hide certain Puavomenu sidebar elements. Takes a whitespace-separated list of element names.

puavo.puavomenu.password_change.link.description: User password change URL override. You can use variables like $(username) in the URL if necessary.
